mapper.insert: INSERT INTO paid_tbl (paid_num, novel_num, paid_snum, paid_title, paid_content1,paid_content2, paid_price) values (paid_num.nextval, #{novel_num}, #{paid_snum}, #{paid_title}, #{paid_content1}, #{paid_content2}, #{paid_price})
